full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Contract Title:** BPM021314 VXRAIL Hardware and Software Maintenance and Support for DND

**Contract Overview:**

The Shared Services Canada (SSC) has invited bids for the provision of VXRAIL Hardware and Software Maintenance and Support for the Department of National Defence (DND).

**Key Details:**

* **Reference Number:** SSC-24-00026335:T
* **Solicitation Number:** BPM021314/26335
* **Publication Date:** April 22, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** May 8, 2024 at 14:00:00
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada
* **End-User Entities:** Shared Services Canada

**Additional Requirements:**

* **Security:** This solicitation does not contain a security requirement.
* **Bidder Inquiries:** Suppliers may submit inquiries or emails to [tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca).

**Attachments:**

The following attachments are available for download:

* https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/9E4368D7-6977-4527-BF85-F949D42BA72E
* https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/67CE007F-FAF4-4E15-92AC-F6D25FA956FB
* https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/7D1362BB-1DE5-4EA8-B4B7-B522781C9A3F
* https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/B337B2F1-2D82-46B7-B248-F821D7DFA05C
* https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/E63C7AB4-E846-423E-A838-65191887EA5E

**Contact Information:**

* **Name:** Eric Lavigne
* **Email:** None
* **Phone:** 343-541-8756
* **Fax
